text: Auguste Serrurier was a French archer. He was born on 25 March 1857. Serrurier competed at the 1900 Summer Olympics.Auguste SerrurierAuguste SERRURIER == References == Category:1857 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French archers Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:People from Nord Category:Sportspeople from Hauts-de-France
title: Auguste Serrurier
